result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony A Butler

records.addlTxt:
9:41 AM cases 22CM735, 22CT245, 22CM591 called. Prosecuting Attorney Monica A Fallon in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Anthony A Butler appeared by phone via Zoom. Attorney Karl A Schmidt in court for Anthony A Butler. Attorney Schmidt states no offer has been received. 

Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on 11/14/2022 at 1:15 PM
Hearing scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 09:30 am.

9:34 AM cases 22CM591, 22CM735, 22CT245 called. Prosecuting Attorney Tiffany M. Winter in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Anthony A Butler in court with Attorney Karl A Schmidt.
Hearing scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 09:30 am.

11:02 AM cases 22CT245, 22CM591, 22CM735 called.  Defendant Anthony A Butler in court, in custody.  Attorney Karl A Schmidt not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Angela Lynn Beranek in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Ryan Kohler on behalf of the defendant. Warrants in older files are quashed. 
In 22CM735: Waives reading of the complaint. 
All files: Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on 9-14-22 at 2:45 PM. 
Return to court: 10-3-22 at 9:30 AM.

9:34 AM cases 22CM591, 22CT245 called. Prosecuting Attorney Monica A Fallon in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Anthony A Butler not in court.  Attorney Karl A Schmidt in court for Anthony A Butler. Attorney Schmidt has no information for the Court as to the Defendant's non-appearance. State requests warrant.

Court orders $50 or Body Only warrant.

Conditions: 
Defendant not to drive without a valid driver's license and IID installed. 
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety. 
Defendant not to consume/possess any alcohol or go into any taverns, bars, liquor stores/place where alcohol is primarily served/sold. 
Defendant not to consume/use/possess any illegal drugs/non-prescribed medications/controlled substances or drug paraphernalia. 
(Covers 22CM591, 22CT245)
